::Firearm::

Firearm cursed himself under his breath. Why did he have to say that 
last sentence? Why couldn't he keep his big mouth shut and at least 
leave Spears some hope?

"Hey, don't think like that," he says. He was starting to really get 
confused. The poor warrior had no idea how hard consoling a femm could 
be, "We'll try to get him back. But we'll need your help."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Spears::
> 
> She face went blank as he spoke the words. "He..killed 
> a...maximal..and they were firing on...him.." She felt her legs get 
> weak and she put a hand on Firearm's shoulder to hold herself 
stable.
> She knew that if Striker was in anyway retreivable, he wouldn't be 
> firing on and killing maximals. She stood there, shaking. He was no 
> onger Striker and that her love was gone for good.
> 
> "He's......gone....then.." she whisp
